alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 5:06AM EST until March 13 at 3:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM EST THIS MORNING TO 4 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Middlesex, Northern New London, Northern Middlesex, Southern New London and Southern New Haven Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM EST this morning to 4 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the wind, rain will change over to snow this afternoon before ending. At least a coating of snow is expected for most areas. As temperatures drop below freezing this afternoon, refreezing is possible on some surfaces, creating the potential for hazardous travel.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
